sourcesContent:
Hello: {{ data.displayName }}

Email: {{ data.email }}

Address:

{{ data.address.line1 }}

{{ data.address.line2 }}

{{ data.address.city }}, {{ data.address.state }}

{{ data.address.zip }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/service/auth.service'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; interface PostalAddress { line1: string; line2: string; city: string; state: string; zip: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'], }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { data: any; address: PostalAddress = { line1: '', line2: '', city: '', state: '', zip: '', }; editMode: boolean = false; constructor( private auth: AuthService, private router: Router, private http: HttpClient ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getProfile(); } getProfile() { this.auth.getProfile().subscribe( (res) => { console.log(res); if (res.success) { this.data = res.data; if (this.data.address) { this.address = this.data.address; } } else { // handle error } }, (err) => { console.log(err); } ); } logout() { localStorage.clear(); this.router.navigate(['/dashboard']); } addAddress() { this.getAddressDetails(this.address.zip).subscribe((data) => { if (data && data[0]) { const addressDetails = data[0]; this.address.city = addressDetails.District; this.address.state = addressDetails.State; this.auth.addAddress(this.address).subscribe( (res) => { if (res.success) { this.getProfile(); } else { // handle error } }, (err) => { console.log(err); } ); } }); } editAddress() { this.getAddressDetails(this.address.zip).subscribe((data) => { if (data && data[0]) { const addressDetails = data[0]; this.address.city = addressDetails.District; this.address.state = addressDetails.State; this.auth.editAddress(this.address).subscribe( (res) => { if (res.success) { this.getProfile(); this.editMode = false; } else { // handle error } }, (err) => { console.log(err); } ); } }); } getAddressDetails(pincode: string) { const url = `http://www.postalpincode.in/api/pincode/${pincode}`; return this.http.get(url).map((res) => res['PostOffice']); } }
